%1$s is using an older version of Telegram, so secret photos will be shown in compatibility mode.\n\nOnce %2$s updates Telegram, photos with timers for 1 minute or less will start working in 'Tap and hold to view' mode, and you will be notified whenever the other party takes a screenshot.
%1$s 正在使用旧版本的Telegram，因此私密照片将以兼容模式显示。\n\n当 %2$s 更新了Telegram后，阅后即焚定时器设置在一分钟之内的照片将采用“点击并按住以查看”模式运行；而且，当对方截取手机画面时，您将会收到通知。

%1$s,
We detected a login into your account from a new device on %2$s

Device: %3$s
Location: %4$s

If this wasn't you, you can go to Settings - Privacy and Security - Terminate all other sessions.

Sincerely,
The Telegram Team

%1$s，
我们发现您的账号于 %2$s 在新的设备上登录

设备： %3$s
位置： %4$s

如果这不是您本人，您可以到「设置—隐私和安全—注销所有其它设备上的会话」注销其登录。

此致，
Telegram 团队
%s invited you to join a secret chat.
A username must have at least 5 characters.
用户名必须至少包含5个字符。
File size shouldn't be greater than %1$s
Hey, let's switch to Telegram: https://telegram.org/dl
亲！和我一起用 Telegram 吧，超棒的聊天工具，简洁高效，没有广告，会话加密，尊重隐私，不受审查过滤：https://telegram.org/dl

If you do, other people will be able to find you by this username and contact you without knowing your phone number.

You can use a–z, 0–9 and underscores.

如果您这样做，别人就可以藉由此用户名称找到您并与您联络，而不需要知道您的手机号码。

您可以使用 a–z，0–9 及下划线。
Leave no trace on our servers
不在服务器上留下记录
最小长度是 5 个字符。
Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.
请确认您的国家代码，并输入您的手机号码。
Reset all notification settings to default
重置所有通知设置为默认值
Set up your first and last name
Sorry, a username can't start with a number.
抱歉，用户名不能以数字开头。
Sorry, this username is already taken.
抱歉，该用户名已被占用。
Start messaging by pressing the\nnew message button in the bottom right corner\nor tap the menu button for more options.
要开始聊天请点击右下角的新建聊天按钮\n，或点击左上角菜单按钮查看更多选项
Tap and hold on user to unblock.
长按一个用户以取消屏蔽
The username must not exceed 32 characters.
用户名不能超过32个字符。

This image is a visualization of the encryption key for this secret chat with %1$s.

If this image looks the same on %2$s's phone, your chat is 200%% secure.

Learn more at telegram.org

此图片是与 %1$s 加密对话的加密密钥的可视化图片。

若此图片与 %2$s 的 手机上的图片一致，你们之间的聊天就是 200%% 安全的。

了解更多请访问 telegram.org
